Material used.Description: Cells were treated with siRNA targeting MTOR or control siRNA.

Readout description.Result Description: Expression levels of mitochondrial genes were measured.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Control siRNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression levels reduced by 50% or more from baseline.

Material used.Description: Livers were extracted from mice treated with the compound.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein levels of mitochondrial enzymes were assessed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Normal liver tissue was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Liver tissue from untreated mice was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein levels reduced by 30% or more from baseline.
